price: 99. Ama isin Yallak kalah taqbuden numtin-wellite numma Yallitte akkinnay tet culak manannon, sin kee ken inkih teetil waaretton.
arabic: لَوۡ كَانَ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ ءَالِهَةٗ مَّا وَرَدُوهَاۖ وَكُلّٞ فِيهَا خَٰلِدُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: law kāna hāulāi ālihatan mā waradūhā wakullun fīhā khālidūna
